remarks: The value of the recursive definition generator at a successor (special case where the characteristic function uses the map operation). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2013.)
statement:
rdgsucmpt.1 $e |- F = rec ( ( x e. _V |-> C ) , A ) $.
rdgsucmpt.2 $e |- ( x = ( F ` B ) -> C = D ) $.
rdgsucmpt $p |- ( ( B e. On /\ D e. V ) -> ( F ` suc B ) = D ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d D x $.
